entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Vegreville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:38 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vegreville 07:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or periods of freezing rain ending late this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
